topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Version Control :: CVS

name: GUI Front End for CVS
short_description: CVSGI (Concurrent Versions System Graphical Interface) is a Java based GUI application  which works with the CVS archiving system. CVSGI GUI acts as an interface between the user and the CVS system.
